type: Type of losgistics object, e.g. air waybill, booking, etc
typeCode: Commonly useed codes for document type, e.g. jfwb, jfhl etc. Leave nlank if unknown
issuedBy: Internet of logistics code of issuing party.
key: JSON field name of code that identifies this logistics object, e.g. 'waybill number', 'UPID' etc.

BreakdownByLineType.TotalLineAmountItem: Sum of  INVOICE_LINE SubTotalLineAmount where ChargeType=ITM
BreakdownByLineType.TotalLineAmountPacking: Sum of  INVOICE_LINE SubTotalLineAmount where ChargeType=PCK
BreakdownByLineType.TotalLineAmountFreight: Sum of  INVOICE_LINE SubTotalLineAmount where ChargeType=FRT
BreakdownByLineType.TotalLineAmountInsurance: Sum of  INVOICE_LINE SubTotalLineAmount where ChargeType=INS

BreakdownByTaxRate.TotalBeforeTaxAmountByRate: Sum of  INVOICE_LINE  BaseAmount for this tax rate
BreakdownByTaxRate.Category: Tax category - e.g. StandardRate, Exempt from Tax (and by implication, the rate that applies, the actual percentage is dependent on the tax jurisdiction)
BreakdownByTaxRate.TotalTaxAmount: Sum of  INVOICE_LINE TaxAmount for this tax rate
